word: G244 - ἀλλοτριεπίσκοπος - allotriepískopos - al-lot-ree-ep-is'-kop-os - Busybody in other men's matters

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Busybody in other men's matters
one who takes the supervision of affairs pertaining to others and in no wise to himself (a meddler in other men's matters)
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G245 and G1985; overseeing others' affairs, that is, a meddler (specifically in Gentile customs): - busybody in other men’s matters.
Cognate: G1980, G1983, G1984, G244
